title: Unit 11: Appearances - Comprehensive Test
description: Test de vocabulario y expresiones conversacionales sobre apariencia física, moda y descripción de personas

questions.question: What do you call hair that is shaped into circles?
Traduce: '¿Cómo se ve tu hermana?'
questions.answer: What does your sister look like?

questions.question: He's got _____ hair and he's very tall.
When you want to identify someone in a group, you might say:
options: He's the one in the yellow pants
questions.answer: He's the one in the yellow pants

questions.question: Identical twins look exactly the same.
Traduce: 'Tiene barba y bigote.'
questions.answer: He has a beard and mustache

questions.question: What does 'She's six foot three' tell you about someone?
Big glasses are out _____ style these days.
Traduce: 'Los jeans ajustados están de moda.'
Braces are something you wear on your teeth.
Which describes someone who has no hair on their head?
She takes _____ her mother. They have the same eyes.
When you can't remember the name of something, you might say:
Traduce: 'Lleva el cabello en cola de caballo.'
questions.answer: She wears her hair in a ponytail
